TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataKey extends System.Object implements class System.IEquatable`1<class System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataKey>, class System.Web.UI.IStateManager
Public Class DataKey Implements IEquatable(Of DataKey), IStateManager
type DataKey = class interface IStateManager interface IEquatable<DataKey>

summary.span: 表示資料繫結控制項中資料錄的主索引鍵欄位。

span.span: Represents the primary key field or fields of a record in a data-bound control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別用來代表資料繫結控制項中的資料錄的主索引鍵。The class is used to represent the primary key for a record in a data-bound control. 其中一個資料來源的多個欄位可以包含一筆資料錄的主索引鍵。The primary key for a record can be composed of one of more fields from the data source. 雖然類別不是集合，它可以儲存多個索引鍵欄位值。Although the class is not a collection, it can store multiple key field values. 當一個時，系統會擴展索引鍵欄位值的建構函式的類別稱為。The key field values are populated when one of the constructors for the class is called. 您可以擷取索引鍵欄位值從物件如下：You can retrieve a key field value from a object in the following ways: - 使用屬性，以擷取中的特定索引處的索引鍵欄位值物件。Use the property to retrieve a key field value at a specific index in the object. - 使用擷取特定欄位的索引鍵欄位值的屬性。Use the property to retrieve a key field value of a specific field. - 使用屬性擷取中的索引 0 處的索引鍵欄位值物件。Use the property to retrieve the value of the key field at index 0 in the object. 這個屬性常用的捷徑時，要擷取的資料錄的索引鍵值的主索引鍵只包含一個欄位。This property is often used as a shortcut to retrieve the key value of a record when the primary key contains only one field. - 使用屬性，以建立可用來逐一查看索引鍵欄位值的物件。Use the property to create an object that can be used to iterate through the key field values. 一般情況下，物件自動產生的資料繫結控制於何時控制項的`DataKeyNames`屬性設定。In general, objects are automatically generated by data-bound controls when the control's `DataKeyNames` property is set. 物件包含索引鍵欄位或欄位中指定的值`DataKeyNames`屬性。The objects contain the values of the key field or fields specified in the `DataKeyNames` property. 一次顯示單一記錄的資料繫結控制項 (例如或是) 通常儲存目前記錄中顯示的物件`DataKey`控制項的屬性。Data-bound controls that display a single record at a time (such as or ) generally store the object for the current record displayed in the `DataKey` property of the control. 一次顯示多筆記錄的資料繫結控制項 (例如) 通常儲存控制項中的每一筆記錄的物件集合。Data-bound controls that display multiple records at a time (such as ) generally store the objects for each record in the control in a collection. 集合接著會儲存在`DataKeys`控制項的屬性。The collection is then stored in the `DataKeys` property of the control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何判斷中記錄的主索引鍵值使用控制屬性物件。The following code example demonstrates how to determine the primary key value of a record in a control using the property of a object. [!code-aspx-csharp[DataKeyValue#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataKeyValue/CS/DataKeyValuecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[DataKeyValue#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/DataKeyValue/VB/DataKeyValuevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 使用指定之索引鍵欄位值的字典初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified dictionary of key field values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式建立的新執行個體類別使用指定的索引鍵欄位值的字典。Use this constructor to create a new instance of the class using the specified dictionary of key field values. 中包含的欄位值物件傳入以進行`keyTable`參數用來填入物件。The field values contained in the object passed in for the `keyTable` parameter are used to populate the object. > [!NOTE] > 這個版本的建構函式不允許您指定的欄位名稱清單事先物件。This version of the constructor does not allow you to specify a list of field names in advance for the object. 由於未事先指定的欄位名稱，欄位名稱和值會儲存在檢視狀態中。Because the field names are not specified in advance, both the field names and values are stored in view state. 若要事先指定的欄位名稱清單，請使用建構函式。To specify a list of field names in advance, use the constructor.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary keyTable, string[] keyNames) cil managed
Public Sub New (keyTable As IOrderedDictionary, keyNames As String())

span.span: The key field values.

param.name: keyNames
param.span: 字串的陣列，包含索引鍵欄位的名稱。

span.span: An array of strings that contain the names of the key fields.

summary.span: 使用指定之索引鍵欄位值的字典和欄位名稱的陣列，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified dictionary of key field values and array of field names.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式建立的新執行個體類別使用指定的索引鍵欄位值的字典和欄位名稱的陣列。Use this constructor to create a new instance of the class using the specified dictionary of key field values and array of field names. 中包含的欄位值物件傳入以進行`keyTable`參數用來填入物件。The field values contained in the object passed in for the `keyTable` parameter are used to populate the object. 這個建構函式也可讓您指定的索引鍵欄位名稱的清單事先透過物件`keyNames`參數。This constructor also allows you to specify a list of the key field names for the object in advance through the `keyNames` parameter. 事先指定的欄位名稱，因為只有索引鍵欄位值會儲存在檢視狀態時使用這個建構函式。Because the field names are specified in advance, only the key field values are stored in view state when this constructor is used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性用來判斷是否物件正在追蹤其檢視狀態變更。The property is used to determine whether the object is tracking its view-state changes. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性主要由控制項開發人員使用。This property is used primarily by control developers.

para.span: 在擴充類別，您可以覆寫這個屬性，指出是否追蹤檢視狀態變更。

summary.span: 載入先前儲存的 物件檢視狀態。

span.span: Loads the previously saved view state of the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法主要供.NET Framework 基礎結構，並不是直接從您的程式碼使用。This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 不過，控制項開發人員可以覆寫這個方法，以指定的自訂伺服器控制項如何還原其檢視狀態。However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ASP.NET 狀態管理概觀](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce(v=vs.100)). 方法來載入先前儲存的檢視狀態的物件。The method is used to load the previously saved view state of the object.

exception.span: 不為 且無法解析為有效的 。

span.span: is not and cannot be resolved to a valid .

para.span: 在擴充類別，您可以覆寫這個方法，以實作您自己的常式，以載入物件的檢視狀態。

span.span: When extending the class, you can override this method to implement your own routine to load the view state for the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 而不是使用或屬性來擷取索引鍵欄位值從物件，您可以使用屬性來判斷的值中位於索引 0 的索引鍵欄位的捷徑物件。Instead of using the or the property to retrieve a key field value from a object, you can use the property as a shortcut to determine the value of the key field at index 0 in the object. 這個屬性通常會用來判斷資料錄的索引鍵欄位值，當記錄有只有一個索引鍵欄位中。This property is commonly used to determine the key field value of a record when the record has only one key field. > [!NOTE] > 如果物件不包含任何索引鍵的欄位，`null`會傳回。If the object does not contain any key fields, `null` is returned. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來判斷資料錄的主索引鍵值。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to determine the primary key value of a record.
